VC_PARSE_ERROR.message: Credential could not be parsed (malformed JSON/JWT/bytes).

VC_CHARSET_INVALID.message: Invalid character encoding or non-UTF-8 content.

VC_SIZE_EXCESSIVE.message: Credential size unusually large; may impact transport or verification.

VC_ISSUER_DID_RESOLVE_FAIL.message: Issuer DID/URL could not be resolved.

VC_ISSUER_METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED.message: Issuer DID method not allowed by profile.

VC_SUBJECT_ID_MISSING.message: credentialSubject.id (or equivalent) is missing when required.

VC_SUBJECT_ID_FORMAT_INVALID.message: credentialSubject.id format is invalid or unexpected.

VC_SUBJECT_BINDING_MISSING.message: Holder binding is missing; cannot prove possession.

VC_JTI_MISSING.message: Unique identifier (jti/id) missing; replay protection may be weaker.

VC_TIME_NBF_AFTER_EXP.message: nbf is after exp; time window invalid.

VC_TIME_IAT_AFTER_EXP.message: iat is after exp; time window invalid.

VC_TIME_CLOCK_SKEW_LARGE.message: Clock skew or token lifetime unusually large.

VC_TIME_NOT_YET_VALID.message: Credential is not yet valid (nbf in future).

VC_STATUS_LIST_INVALID.message: Status list/entry invalid or could not be decoded.

VC_KEY_ALG_UNSUPPORTED.message: Signature algorithm not supported by profile.

VC_KEY_FORMAT_MISMATCH.message: Key format/type does not match signature/proof type.

VC_KEY_RESOLVE_FAIL.message: Could not resolve verification key (DID Doc/JWKS/VM).

VC_KEY_NOT_AUTHORIZED.message: Key is not authorized for assertion/proof purpose.

VC_SIG_CRITICAL_HEADER_UNKNOWN.message: Unknown or unsupported critical header/parameter present.

VC_SCHEMA_UNDECLARED_FIELDS.message: Undeclared or unexpected fields present (schema mismatch).

VC_AUD_MISMATCH.message: 'aud' does not match the intended verifier/relying party.

VC_NONCE_MISSING.message: Nonce/challenge missing where required by profile.

VC_NONCE_MISMATCH.message: Nonce/challenge mismatch with the verifier request.

SDJWTVC_UNBOUND_DISCLOSURE.message: Disclosure present but not bound to SD-JWT claims.

SDJWTVC_CLAIM_INTEGRITY_FAIL.message: Reconstructed claims do not match signed payload.

SDJWTVC_KEYBINDING_MISSING.message: Key binding (holder binding) is missing or invalid.

SDJWTVC_KB_ALG_UNSUPPORTED.message: Key binding JWS algorithm unsupported by profile.

SDJWTVC_EXP_INVALID.message: Token lifetime (exp/nbf/iat) is unusual or invalid.

JSONLD_CONTEXT_REMOTE_FETCH_FAIL.message: @context remote document could not be fetched/resolved.

JSONLD_CONTEXT_CONFLICT.message: Context term conflicts or redefinitions detected.

JSONLD_VCDM_VERSION_UNEXPECTED.message: Unexpected VC Data Model version/terms for profile.

JSONLD_PROOF_TYPE_UNSUPPORTED.message: Linked Data Proof type is unsupported for profile.

JSONLD_PROOF_PURPOSE_INVALID.message: proofPurpose invalid or not 'assertionMethod' when required.

JSONLD_PROOF_CREATED_INVALID.message: 'created' timestamp invalid or outside acceptable window.

JSONLD_VM_RESOLVE_FAIL.message: verificationMethod could not be resolved to a key.

JSONLD_CONTROLLER_RESOLVE_FAIL.message: Controller/DID Document could not be resolved.

JSONLD_EVIDENCE_INVALID.message: Evidence object present but invalid format/content.

JSONLD_STATUS_2021_INVALID.message: StatusList2021 entry invalid or not decodable.

VCJWT_SUBJECT_MISMATCH.message: JWT 'sub' does not match 'vc.credentialSubject.id' when required.

VCJWT_ALG_UNSUPPORTED.message: Unsupported or discouraged JWS 'alg' for VC-JWT.

VCJWT_KID_MISSING.message: 'kid' missing in header; key discovery may be ambiguous.

VCJWT_EXP_INVALID.message: Token lifetime (exp/nbf/iat) is unusual or invalid.
